meanings.definition: The quality or state of being plump or full.
meanings.sent1: Her plumosity made her look healthy and happy.
meanings.sent2: The baby's plumosity was adorable as he giggled.
meanings.sent3: The plumosity of the teddy bear made it the perfect cuddle buddy.
meanings.sent4: The plumosity of the clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The plumosity of the ripe peach made it irresistible to pick and eat.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a round or full shape.
meanings.sent1: The pumpkin's plumosity made it stand out in the patch.
meanings.sent2: The snowman's plumosity was enhanced by the scarf and hat.
meanings.sent3: The plumosity of the balloon made it float gracefully in the air.
meanings.sent4: The plumosity of the rose petals gave them a delicate appearance.
meanings.sent5: The plumosity of the pillow made it perfect for a cozy nap.

meanings.definition: The appearance of being full or rounded.
meanings.sent1: The squirrel's cheeks showed plumosity after gathering nuts.
meanings.sent2: The vase's plumosity made it look elegant on the table.
meanings.sent3: The plumosity of the watermelon made it a refreshing summer treat.
meanings.sent4: The plumosity of the clouds created a picturesque sunset.
meanings.sent5: The plumosity of the cheeks indicated a big smile on her face.
